ygData.subject: The war drags on...

Date: Wed, 27 Dec 2000 15:20:52 EST
Subject: The war drags on...
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor (gestalt)/Sixshot/Double 
Punch/
Injecotr/Manterror/Bumblebee/Beeline/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Firestarter/Unitron/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Chordate:





The 45 foot Alliance gestalt watched his Maximal gestalt enemy climb to its 
feet and raise a rifle from subspace.  The crimson eyes of Oblitertron glowed 
bright, a single bolt of laser fire flashing through the air and digging at 
the Maximal gestalt's chest, knocking him back a few meters.  

---

Defensor's rifle hung at his side as he felt a searing pain in his chest.  
The blast hadn't penetrated his armor, not by a long shot, but it hurt pretty 
bad nonetheless.  As Oblitertron charged, a bolt lancing out from his rifle, 
Defensor raised his own rifle, firing off two bolts into the oncoming knee of 
Oblitertron.

Defensor let out a yell as Oblitertron's bolt hit squarely where the optic 
blast wound was, sending Defensor back a few more meters, the injured 
Oblitertron still coming as Defensor attempted to gain a second wind.

---

Dark Wolf roared from some random shots, raising his sword and swinging it 
down with all his strength, his arm shaking as the blade connected with the 
hull of the ship.  Dark Wolf let out a howl of satisfaction as he saw the 
blade disappear a few meters intot he thick hull of the Maximal warship.  He 
tried to pull the blade out, but couldn't.  He gripped the hilt with both 
hands, pulling as hard as he could, nearly falling backwards onto his back.  
But he managed to keep his composure.

The smaller gestalt caught two missiles in the back, sending him hitting into 
the hull of the ship.

---

Sixshot took off into the air, dodging the missiles as they exploded on the 
ground by only a few feet.  He raised both of his hypersonic concussion 
blasters, firing off two blasts each at Sky Lynx.

---

Double Punch watched Beeline fly downward, firing off a few optic blasts, 
intercepting the missiles.

Double Punch raised his tail, firing off a burst of acid, intercepting most 
of the shots and shells as four shots struck him in his armored exo-skeleton 
chest.  He took a step back in pain, firing off two energy signature missiles 
from both pinchers, two at Torca, two at Sideswipe.

---

Injector hovered in the air, not being shut at, and raised his stinger, 
firing off two stinger missiles at Torca as he gained velocity into the air.

---

Manterror got hit by Kluster's shot but was more interested in the numerous 
shots coming from Ratchet.  He flew to the side, avoiding the tusk missile 
and a little less than a dozen of the shots, eight striking his exo-skeleton 
armor.  He grunted, raising both arms.

He fired off four ion disks from his left arm at Ratchet, another four from 
the other arm at Kluster's chest.

---

Bumblebee fired off a wave of ten optic blasts, intercepting the tusk missile 
and two incoming shots.  The other thirteen shots headed at him, and he flew 
to the side, several shots striking him.  He cursed, his form not that 
armored.  He raised both arms, firing off two stinger missiles from his left 
launcher at Torca, another two from the other at Ratchet.

---

Ares looked as more people shot at Sixshot.  This was getting on his nerves 
ever so slightly.  He put his laser rifle into subspace, and took out his 
grenade launcher.  He set it to explode on impact.  

He raised the weapon, firing off a grenade at Sideswipe.

---

Sun Crusher raised his weapon, firing off three bolts from his laser rifle at 
Sky Lynx.

---

Reflector flew through the air, raising his rifle and firing off a quick 
burst of laser energy from his rifle at Torca's chest.

---

Nemesis Enforcer looked up, seeing Perndabot heading down towards him.  
Nemesis flew to the left, letting Perndabot plummet downward.  "Bye, bye!"

---

Scattershot flew faster, raising his weapon and taking aim at Iron Raptor's 
head.

---

Unitron headed for the ground, transforming in mid air, slamming to the burnt 
grass, raising his cannon.  He fired off two explosive shells, each exploding 
against the entry way.  The mounted machine-gun on his turret turned, firing 
off armor-piercing rounds each cutting through the entry way, making an 
outline in it.

"Aim for the outline, Firestarter."

---

Firestarter raised both arms, firing off two missiles from each forearm 
launcher.  The shots struck the outline made in the entryway, causing a 
slight hole only several inches in diameter.

"Blast it!" the red robot yelled, firing off ten rapid optic blasts into the 
entry way with little effect.

Unitron transformed into his biped mode, running forward and slamming into 
the entry way with his shoulder, causing a large dent but not adding onto the 
hole.

---

Chordate watched Firestarter and Unitron, and he laughed.  "Hull integrity at 
80.5%.  That entry way appears to be at 44% integrity."  He received 
Kluster's comm. transmission.  

"Acknowledged, sir, initiating the Level 4 Lockdown." he replied, pressing a 
few buttons, then entering a few commands red letters blinked on the view 
screen;

LEVEL FOUR LOCKDOWN INITIATED...

Over ever access hatch an entry way a four foot thick plate of steel slid 
over the access ways, adding onto the protection.

LEVEL FOUR LOCKDOWN COMPLETE...

"Good." Chordate said more to himself than Hysteria.  "Now we don't have to 
worry about people breaking in."
